content.question: Which of the following can be concluded about the United States based on the authorâ€™s descriptions in the excerpt?

choices.label: Regional political interests dominated political debates.
A common national culture was developing.
Educational reforms contributed to increased literacy.
New transportation routes made shipping books easier.

content.answer: A common national culture was developing.

topic.text: 4.9: The Development of an American Culture

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
